name: Extra Spell Synthesis
text: You push your combination of magic to greater heights.
benefit: You can perform one additional spell synthesis per day.
special: You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, you can use this ability one additional time per day.
text_zh: 你在结合法术上的造诣已达到全新的高度。
benefit_zh: 你每天可以额外施展一次法术融合。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取此专长。你每次选取此专长，每天便能再多施展一次法术融合职业能力。
